OnboardingPage.title: Welcome to Boardify
OnboardingPage.subtitle: Set up your profile to get started.

username.label: Username
username.helper: 3-30 characters. Lowercase letters, numbers, dots, underscores and hyphens.

signOutDialog.title: Sign out?
signOutDialog.description: You can sign back in at any time with your Google account.

UsersPage.title: Users
UsersPage.description: Find players by name or username.
UsersPage.results: {count, plural, one {# user found} other {# users found}}

SignInPage.title: Log in to continue
SignInPage.subtitle: To access {destination}, sign in with Google.

players.title: Connect with players
players.description: Find profiles, add friends, and compare collections.

groups.title: Join groups
groups.description: Create and manage groups for your game nights.

collections.title: Build your collections
collections.description: Add games to favorites, wishlist, and owned lists.

footer.note: We only use Google authentication. No extra password required.

UserProfilePage.friendsOnlyNotice: This profile is visible to friends only. Send a friend request to unlock games and stats.

match.unavailable: Start adding games to your profile to track compatibility.

favorite.title: Favorites
favorite.matchBothEmpty: Both of you have no favorite games yet, counted as 100% match.

wishlist.title: Wishlist
wishlist.matchBothEmpty: Both of you have no wishlist games yet, counted as 100% match.

owned.title: Owned
owned.matchBothEmpty: Both of you have no owned games yet, counted as 100% match.

compatibility.unavailable: Start adding games to your profile to track compatibility.

dialog.title: Unfriend {targetName}?
dialog.description: You will stop seeing each other as friends. You can send a new request later.

UserProfileNotFound.title: Profile not available
UserProfileNotFound.description: We could not find a user with that username.

sentRequests.title: Sent requests
sentRequests.description: Invitations you sent and join requests you submitted.

receivedRequests.title: Received requests
receivedRequests.description: Invitations you received and requests sent to groups you admin.

empty.title: No groups yet.
empty.descriptionOwn: Browse groups to join one, or create your own.

browseGames.title: Browse games
browseGames.description: Explore the catalog, open game details, and filter by players or category.

connectFriends.title: Connect with friends
connectFriends.description: Find players, send requests, and grow your board game circle.

joinGroups.title: Join groups
joinGroups.description: Find or create groups to organize game nights with friends and new players.

collection.title: Track your collection
collection.description: Keep your list of owned games up to date and know what is ready for game night.

favorites.title: Manage favorites
favorites.description: Highlight your all-time picks and quickly revisit the games you love most.

planning.title: Plan game nights
planning.description: Use group libraries and collections to quickly decide what everyone can play.

wishlist.title: Build your wishlist
wishlist.description: Save the games you want to play next and keep your picks organized.

details.title: Detailed game pages
details.description: Open rich game sheets with categories, ratings, difficulty, and your own status at a glance.

metadata.title: About | Boardify
metadata.description: Learn what Boardify is and how it helps you organize game nights.

header.title: About Boardify
header.description: Boardify helps you decide what to play faster by organizing your games, friends, and groups in one place.

solve.title: What It Solves
solve.description: Stop guessing what everyone can play. Boardify surfaces shared options quickly.

flow.title: How It Works
flow.description: Build your library, connect with friends, and join groups to compare collections.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Profile visibility and invitation flows are designed so you control who sees what.

author.title: From The Author
author.paragraph1: I built Boardify after repeating the same pre-game ritual every week: endless chat messages, unclear player counts, and lots of last-minute what can we actually play moments.
author.paragraph2: The goal was not just to list games, but to reduce friction before meeting friends. Boardify brings collections, availability, and group context together so choosing a game feels quick, fair, and collaborative instead of chaotic.

metadata.title: Contact | Boardify
metadata.description: Get in touch with the Boardify team for support, bugs, or feature ideas.

header.title: Contact
header.description: Need help, found a bug, or want to suggest a feature? Reach out and include as much context as possible.

support.title: General Support
support.description: Account issues, onboarding, or questions about how Boardify works.

bugs.title: Bug Reports
bugs.description: Share steps, expected result, and actual result so we can reproduce quickly.

features.title: Feature Requests
features.description: Tell us the problem you want solved and how you currently work around it.
